 P romotion for pre-paid subscribers recharge account on Labor Day ( KM trả trước nạp tiền nhân ngày Quốc Tế Lao Động) 
 1. E ligible subscribers: 
 
 Prepaid subscribers recharge account (active, inactive, deactivate, at the time of keeping number subscriber, in the first 10 recharge cards period). 
 AND the above subscribers must use 50,000 VND and below from 0h of 15/3/2012 to end of 14/4/2012. (Not applicable for the total usage in the main account = 0d or > 50,000) 
 Post-paid subscribers change to pre-paid subscribers satisfied the above conditions can join this promotion. 
 
 2. B enefits: 
 
 
 50% EXTRA top-up credits 
 
 
 Unlimited times of top-up and value of scratch cards. 
 
 
 Applicable for every top up during promotion period, as following: 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Top up card 
 
 
 Bonus 
 
 
 
 
 KM2 credit ( offline) 
 
 
 KM3 credit ( online)

 Note: 
 Subscribers participating in new pre-paid Mobile Broadband will be able to enjoy this promotion if they are eligible subscribers of this promotion ( An additional of 25% to KM2 and data is not applies ). When this promotion ended will continue to enjoy the old promotion. 
 3. T ime of promotion: 
 
 
 From 25/04/2012 to 27/04/2012 .
